detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1),block.coinbase,block.difficulty)) % 20 + 1 (shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#22):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1),block.coinbase,block.difficulty)) % 20 + 1](shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#L22):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in CryptoRoulette.play(uint256) (shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#25-39):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#34)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastPlayed = now (shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#38)
	- shuffle() (shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#37)
		- secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1),block.coinbase,block.difficulty)) % 20 + 1 (shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#22)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [CryptoRoulette.play(uint256)](shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#L25-L39):
	External calls:
	- [msg.sender.transfer(this.balance)](shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#L34)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [lastPlayed = now](shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#L38)
	- [shuffle()](shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#L37)
		- [secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1),block.coinbase,block.difficulty)) % 20 + 1](shared/other/crypto_roulette/crypto_roulette_1round.sol#L22)
